data.text: @PodThorn @NetsDaily Ok…the graph you showed indicates the death rate by race is better today than it was prior to vaccinations being readily available. Either way Kyrie not playing isn’t having an impact on those numbers…people who listen to Kyrie are young and they aren’t dying from Covid

@lippy01 @NetsDaily What does anything you wrote have to do with what I said. 

Go back and look at the graph and start again,
@PodThorn @NetsDaily Not even close…older people die at a much higher rate (and are now the most vaccinated <which is good>)
@PodThorn @NetsDaily This is an insane take… kyrie has nothing to do with those statistics

@PodThorn @NetsDaily I used to work in medical facilities across NJ. Been there seen it. This is because they systematically stole our wealth and resources. Every single issue we face boils down to that.

@4Evashook @NetsDaily There’s no empathy. That’s why we die the most. We are 3rd class citizens in this country. Dogs get more empathy.

I invite any Nets fan on Twitter to come with me to Kings County Hospital or the Welcare Hospital in East NY and see the old black men nobody cares about us.

@PodThorn @NetsDaily Black people are affected the worst by everything except sunburn. Strange that Covid is the thing that brings about so much empathy from doctors and politicians. I can see why people get conspiratorial.
